items.title: After Trump pressure, Indiana lawmakers shift to convene on redistricting
items.description: State House Republicans say they will gavel in on Dec. 1, while the Republican-led state Senate will gather on Dec. 8. The state Senate leader had pre...

items.title: Trump administration prosecutions focus new attention on grand juries
items.description: The administration has struggled with an unusual level of rejections in some cases and procedural stumbles in others.

items.title: Trump wants a bigger White House ballroom. His architect disagrees.
items.description: The president and James McCrery had argued in recent weeks over the project’s size, with Trump pushing him to expand the ballroom.

items.title: FBI seeks interviews with Democrats whom Trump called ‘traitors’
items.description: The Trump administration has aggressively sought to punish lawmakers who encouraged service members to disobey unlawful orders.

items.title: What comes next in the James Comey and Letitia James cases?
